properties.entry: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM NO , A.* FROM( SELECT INQ_NO , INQ_CATE , INQ_TITLE , INQ_CONTENT , INQ_CREATE_DATE , INQ_ANSWER , EMAIL FROM INQUIRE I JOIN MEMBER ON (I.USER_NO = MEMBER.USER_NO) ORDER BY INQ_CREATE_DATE DESC )A ) WHERE NO BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO INQUIRE ( INQ_NO , INQ_ANSWER ) VALUES ( ? ? )
